title: Major Track Fault on North-South Line

title_translations.ms: Ralat Jejaring Utama di Laluan Utara-Selatan

updates.text: [NSL] UPDATE: Free bus service between #Admiralty and #AngMoKio has ceased.
[NSL] CLEARED: Train services from #JurongEast towards #Kranji are now operating normally.Free buses are still available.
[NSL]UPDATE: Estimate 10 mins additional travelling time from #JurongEast to #Kranji towards MarinaBay due to track fault.
[NSL] UPDATE: Free buses are now available at affected stations between #Admiralty and #AngMoKio.
[NSL] UPDATE: Free buses are now available at affected stations between #Admiralty and #Khatib.
[NSL]UPDATE: Estimate 20 mins additional travelling time from #JurongEast to #Kranji towards MarinaBay due to track fault.
[NSL]: Estimate 10 mins additional travelling time from #ChoaChuKang to #Kranji towards MarinaBay due to track fault.
